totalShareStatistics.description: Contains the aggregate share statistics for a given page

uniqueImpressionsCount.description: The count of unique users who saw the shared content.

clickCount.description: The total number of clicks on the shared content.

engagement.description: An overall measure of engagement combining different interactions on the shared content.

likeCount.description: The total number of likes received on the shared content.

commentCount.description: The total number of comments on the shared content.

shareCount.description: The total number of shares of the shared content.

commentMentionsCount.description: The count of mentions in the comments associated with the shared content.

impressionCount.description: The total number of times the shared content was displayed to users.

shareMentionsCount.description: The count of mentions in the shared content itself.

organizationalEntity.description: Information about the organizational entity associated with the share statistics.
